update common_housequestion_strategy
question_type_id = #{questionTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where erp_id = #{erpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update common_housequestion_strategy set question_type_id = #{questionTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_question_id = #{parentQuestionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, browsed = #{browsed,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_no = #{userNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, answered_flag = #{answeredFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isfinished = #{isfinished,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isshow = #{isshow,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lastmodified = #{lastmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastsync = #{lastsync,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateflag = #{updateflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deleteflag = #{deleteflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, synchronized_flag = #{synchronizedFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, synchronized_time = #{synchronizedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, publisher_name = #{publisherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where erp_id = #{erpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT chs.question_type_id, chs.title, chs.content, chs.parent_question_id, chs.create_time, chs.browsed, chs.user_no, chs.last_modify_time, chs.answered_flag, chs.isfinished, chs.isshow, chs.erp_id, chs.lastmodified, chs.lastsync, chs.updateflag, chs.deleteflag, chs.synchronized_flag, chs.synchronized_time, chs.publisher_name, cqss.subtype_name as cqss_subtype_name, cqss.parent_type_id as cqss_parent_type_id, cqss.create_time as cqss_create_time, cqss.erp_id as cqss_erp_id, cqst.type_name as cqst_type_name, cqst.icon_url as cqst_icon_url, cqst.hover_icon_url as cqst_hover_icon_url, cqst.create_time as cqst_create_time, cqst.erp_id as cqst_erp_id FROM common_housequestion_strategy chs INNER JOIN common_question_strategy_subtype cqss ON chs.question_type_id = cqss.erp_id INNER JOIN common_question_strategy_type cqst ON cqss.parent_type_id = cqst.erp_id WHERE cqst.erp_id = #{StrategyTypeId} AND chs.deleteflag = 0 AND cqss.deleteflag = 0 AND cqst.deleteflag = 0 AND chs.isshow = 1 ORDER BY chs.synchronized_time DESC LIMIT 5
